analyzed: rtog pa med kyang phyin ci log bzhi rnams la thugs rjes 'khor zhing rang bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa rnams sel bar byed kyang mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //

original: zla ba'i snying pos gsol pa /
analyzed: zla ba'i snying pos gsol pa /
translated: Candragarbha said:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: rigs kyi bu /

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /

original: de spong bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: de spong bar byed pa ni /
translated: The elimination of thoseüîΩis the perfection of wisdom with outflows.

analyzed: de la zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /

original: mthong ba'i lam gyi rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam gyi rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te /

analyzed: ye shes de ni / rtog pa thams cad dang bral @264a *//

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /

original: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rang bzhin med pas /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o //

analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams dus gsum du mi dmigs shing ma bcings ma grol bar shes par bya'o //

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas /
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do //

original: chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas /
analyzed: chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do //

original: chos thams cad mtshan ma med pas /
analyzed: chos thams cad mtshan ma med pas /

original: chos thams cad skye ba med pas /
analyzed: chos thams cad skye ba med pas /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa'o //

original: chos thams cad chad pa med pas /
analyzed: chos thams cad chad pa med pas /

analyzed: chos thams cad 'ong ba med pas /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gro ba med pa nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gro ba med pa nyid do //

analyzed: chos thams cad rtag pa med pas /
